Data Submission Procedure

To better coordinate data collection from the client, we have setup a group email address which will forward the client's email to relevant personnel. The purpose of creating this group email is to ensure that there is no single bottle-neck when comes to handling of client's content. 

The group email address : submit@ounch.com
Will be forwarded to: KF, Joy & Lishan

After sorting out the content, the email can then be forwarded to different people in the company to perform the actual tasks.

Do take note that all “request” of work should be submitted to Asana for easier tracking. As this request is internal, we are not using Ticketing System to handle this.
